1.content:
"And that's all. We're done, My boy."

"Thank You, Grandma."

"Oh, I'm glad you found that old tome and brought it to me, your parents didn't like that you entered into the arcane arts." Said a kindly old woman as she sat down on the old, rocky chair, you bowed to her holding an old book, you smiled.

"They're not here, aren't they." The old woman chuckled on that response.

"Yes, they're not." She says and sighed "Your mother has such a promising potential but she discarded it all for meaningless material gain." She says in disappointment.

"I'm glad to prove you that I'm not like her." You said to her, you were an average guy, with an average family or so you though, turns out that your family from your mother side has been mages from the longest of time and frankly you were skeptical until you found the tome and saw its content, you started doing what its written out of pure boredom and you saw how each practice began to get genuine effects on you and your surroundings.

You show it to your grandmother, she implied to be a witch in the past but originally thought to be a joke.

She was serious about it.

She taught you more than just what its told in the book, she thought you how to mold reality around you, to become invisible, shrink, grows and Teleports and even planewalking and mass alteration. But warned you that using all those things at once may tire you as you didn't have the mana pools required to do those things, so far, she gave you the "basics." to experiment with it

"Yes, I'm too, too bad that this is far I can teach you."

"Uh? Why?"

"The Arcane School encourage the apprentices to create their own spells and experiment with potions to branch out their own type of style, there are guides on how so written in that book but you're in your own." She says "My spells are too complex for you to learn, built and made with extra steps to follow with utmost perfection, not fit for trial and error unless you wanna lose some part of your body or don't mind scarring."

You flinched in the thought of that.

"But don't worry sweetie, creating spells may sound like a chore but its quite practical to sharpen your abilities and knowledge. Alternatively, you could try just planewalking and pick a power from that dimension and work on a spell from it." The old lady says "I did it that way."

"Really?" You ask in disbelief "Is really that easy?"

"Well, no, you still had to create the basis of the spell, sorcery and managed the mana required from it." She says "But you'll jump many steps doing it this way, besides, the travels themselves are reward enough."

"I see, so go to a different plane and see, seems easy."

"it is. sometimes it is more productive than it advertised by the school." She confessed, "sometimes, mages take vacations to the multiverse at large, sometimes, even get new lives traveling." She then turns grim "But many either get lost traveling or lose their lives on worlds they aren't prepared for. This is the reason why it is a good idea to create spells before going into travels."

You gulped a bit nervous, the old woman chuckled "I think I scared you enough, be sure to go into universes you know before thinking on travel."

"Wait... Think of a Universe?" You asked in curiosity, your grandmother nods

"Yes, my boy, you see, all those works of fiction? they're real, my boy." She reveals with a fond smile "The Multiverse is big and ever expanding, for every work fiction, every idea, every story told or even a concept, its real somewhere in the everlasting multiverse and our craft allows us to explore it all, All we have to do... is to think about it the moment we leave."

"... That's it? I thought it would involve a very complicated ritual."

"No, no, no." The old woman chuckled as she shakes her head "Those are television cliches, there is not ritual only the right incantations and even then, its short one that takes like four words, the right mana output and the thought of the world you wanna go in." That's sound amazing, imagine go to different worlds like Naruto, Smash Bros or

"I don't know... that's sound really easy, Too easy, Any universe I can think of?"

"Yes, dear." She confirmed "Oh, I remember when I went in my first travel, I tought on my favorite book series, it was my ideal fantasy world and the idea of going to it made it a dream come true, I even met my heroes... it was then I noticed something was wrong."

"Wrong?"

"Yes I forgot to tell you this... you see, the multiverse is big, we go to a universe that we believe we know but upon seeing it for the very first time in our own eyes, we start to see details that don't add up from what we know, it can range from smaller, barely noticeable things but then are times we see things completely different that make no sense with the information we know. It is then we truly come to understand that not all what we know can be applied to the real universe we visit." She paused. "My heroes were the same, spiritually but they were different, as in different genders." Your eyes widen on this

"The Main Heroine I used to idolize was, in reality, a hunk of a man and he was... really good with his hands" She chuckled, you cringe, trying to not think of your elderly grandmother getting all frisky with an Adonis. "We dated even, the love interest was still a man and he didn't bend that way but our relationship didn't make it." She then looked grim "Just like in the story, he died in a heroic fashion, I tried my best to make the ending different, to let him share the same fate as the heroine from the book but as the chosen one, that type of sacrifice was needed for the world to survive."

"I'm sorry to hear that, grandma..."

"Oh, that's fine, dear, I moved on. But yes, remember what I've told you and you'll be a splendid Sorcerer by then and now please, can you help me bake some Cookies?"

***


Its been months since that talk, Your grandmother went missing days after that, giving you a letter that she went on vacation and to visit some "friends".

You know what that means, it was time for you to do the same to complete your training and besides, you may as well enjoy your time as you go through the multiverse, before making the portal, you began to start by placing a runic beacon to an object of yours, this beacon was to help you return back to your world.

With that done, you began the incantation of the portal, the recited the words as your mana flared up, a purple vortex appeared right in front of you, swirling with arcane energy. You had a world in mind and grinned
as you walked straight into the vortex and onto the new world, one thta could help you progress or just to observe and interact with the locals, to see characters of fiction made real.

The world you thought was...

1353.title: Create my Own

151.content:
There's plenty of places to visit in the timeline of Dragonball.

Do you start at the beginning, when Goku met Bulma? You would have a chance at beating Goku at this time, if that's your thing. Or you could seduce the boy-crazed teen Bulma.
Or maybe become the strongest mage, like how Goku becomes the strongest fighter?
Maybe let the Heroes get the glory, while you get the girls, like Chi Chi, Launch, Cheelai, android 18, Zangya and more?

Really, there's so much potential when you start at the beginning.

===

Or perhaps you try your hand at a timeline where there are few villains to fight? This would be the timeline where Imperfect Cell came from. Trunks used the remote to disable the androids, but was killed by Cell and had his time machine stolen. Bulma would be stricken with grief and the world is very devastated. Buu is still within his sealed ball.

Some things you could do is help Bulma, maybe use your magic to de-age her and have a sexy genius at your side. Help out the world.

Perhaps use a spell to link the Dragonballs to you and boost their power? Just so you have an easier time with things.

Maybe turn Majin Buu into a female Majin, seduce her, and have an unstoppable bodyguard.

The World may be ruined, but you can rebuild it to your whims.

===

Or perhaps you arrive at a world where all the strongest fighters are women. Yes, a rule34 Dragonball.

Better get out those stamina and defense spells, as you might have a harem, but it's a harem of planet-busting amazons!

===

Perhaps you might like to try your hand at helping the Supreme Kai of Time, Chronoa ▼
https://dragonball.fandom.com/wiki/Chron...
?

Thus, you'd be able to pick and choose what eras of time and even timelines you can help out.

Just two things to keep in mind.
One, Chronoa is a horrible cook, but still wants to cook for everyone
Two, Beware of Towa, who will use whatever she can to create an Universe filled with evil.

1512.content:
You landed in a wasteland, where nothing but nature was… At least that was your intent.

There were a few craters, ditches, and torn-up bits of ground.

You sighed, “I should have known that gohan and Trunks might’ve fought the androids here.”

You used your magic to look for the magic container that held Majin Buu. To your relief, it was only a mile away. So with a smile, you began to head there, planning on changing Buu to your liking.

You decided to change the Fat Majin Buu to Android 21, though you planned on keeping the Buu name. After all, you were in a time where people would be afraid of the word ‘android’ for a long time.

Standing above the spot where the container was deeply buried, you drew a magic seal in the ground, so that no one would see what you were doing. Then you chanted, knowing it would take some time because Majin Buu was not only very powerful, but had the magic power of the Grand Kaioshin within them.

You had to take breaks and were glad that you had a tent and some food with you. But over time, you felt Majin Buu’s mind and body change from overweight man-child to Android 21’s sexy female body and mind.

You were wary of Majin Buu’s seemingly endless hunger, so you added in something, a taste for sexual juices and made that your magically enchanted cum would be more filling to her than anything else.

Not only would it keep Buu from going insane from hunger and destroying everything, but it would keep Buu loyal to you.

Once your scanning spells told you several times that Buu was now Android 21, you teleported Buu out of their… her seal and put her in front of you.

“Hungry… So hungry…” Buu listlessly cried out as they laid on the ground. She was in the pink female Majin form.

You smiled as you undid your pants and began to jerk off.

Buu sniffed a few times before looking in your direction. She got on all fours as she cooed, “Oh, a cute boy with some tasty cream for me? You shouldn’t have!”

“Well, you are a beauty and you are hungry,” You replied as she crawled towards you.

You smiled as she sniffed your dick a few times. Then she licked it until you let out some precum. She chuckled before swallowing your dick. Her tongue swirled around a few times as you felt her make swallowing motion before you cummed.
You cast a spell to get you hard again as Buu was looking up at you. Had you been aware of Buu’s ability to learn any move by simply seeing it once extended to even magic, you might’ve been more wary.

Once she had her fill, Buu wiped her mouth with her tongue and stood up. She asked, “So… who are you?”

“I am Anon and I am not from this world. I traveled here via magic and I…” You began. “Well, you were a pink manchild before I changed you into the hot number you currently are.”

Buu smiled before she felt up her body. “Well, I thank you for all of that. So what now?”

“We travel to Capsule Corp and help fix the world,” you answered.

Buu smiled at you, “That’s a great idea! With our combined powers, we can do anything!”

Then her smile faded before she asked, “So where’s Capsule Corp?”

“I… I don’t know. Let’s just pick a direction and fly until we can find someone who can tell us,” You answered.

Buu nodded before asking, “Can you fly?”

“Not without a spell. Can you carry me?” You asked.

And so Buu carried you in a bridal carry until you came across a ruined town.

Buu and you healed people and even helped fix some buildings. As a reward, they told you where Capsule Corp was. It was in West city, Region 28.

===
Bulma was partially laying on a table, nursing a bottle of beer.

On one hand, the androids were disabled by a remote and she was to dismantle them. Even if the androids were cyborgs and still human, people wanted them taken apart. Due to the possibility of traps, Bulma was assigned to take care of the Androids in any way she deemed fit.

On the other hand, something killed her son, Trunks, and stole the time machine. Whatever it was, it had snapped her son’s neck with something like a large hose.

The people in the ruined West city mourned Trunks, as he and Gohan had protected the planet from the androids. Trunks’ burial had been a few days ago.

She sighed, “I guess this is my life now. Hiding away in a bottle until my liver gives up… unless I decide to make a better liver and wind up living forever…”

“Excuse me, but is there anything we can do to help you?” You asked, knocking at the doorframe of an opened door.

She looked back at you and let out a long annoyed sigh. “What do you want?”

“We’d like to help you,” You answered.

“Can you teleport to another planet?” Bulma asked as she sat up and looked at you. She had a few wrinkles on her face, but otherwise looked beautiful.

“Yes,” you answered.

“Since you can’t, go-Wait,what?” Bulma asked, her mood changing from sad and angry to surprised and hopeful. “You… You can?”

“I need a brief description of either the location or the people living there,, but yes, I can use magic,” you answered.

“C… Come in. We have something to talk about. I might be a genius at technology, but I am familiar with magic,” Bulma answered as she stood up. Her mechanic outfit was partially unzipped, letting you see her big boobs. She almost re-zipped her outfit, but seeing that you were just out of your teens, she decided to use whatever cards she had to get her son back.

After she prepared some beef stew, Bulma served it out as she said, “So… the people I’m looking for are some green aliens with antennas, robes, and no hair. The sky of their planet is green and the grass is blue. They call themselves Namekians.”

You produced a crystal ball. Bulma made no comment and simply stared. You waved your hands over it until an image of a namekian appeared. They seemed to be sitting around, looking at nature.

“Can they see us?” Bulma whispered.

“No, but they can hear us,” You said.

“Hello! It’s me, Bulma!” Bulma said.

The Namekian stopped and looked around, saying, “Bulma? Where are you?”

“I’m on Earth, using some magic device to contact you. Who are you?” Bulma asked, a big grin appearing on her face.

“It is I, Dende. How is Gohan?” The Namekian asked.

“It’s a long story and a sad one at that,” Bulma answered. She looked at you and asked, “Can you send one of these balls to him?”

You nodded and waved your hand. Another crystal ball appeared by Dende’s feet. Bulma said, “This will allow you to contact and see me.”

As Dende picked up the crystal ball, he asked, “Gohan died, didn’t he?”

Bulma nodded before saying, “Yes. He and the others died in a fight against two evil androids.”

A tear ran down Dende’s cheek before he said, “Heroes to the end. Do you require help avenging them?”

“We managed to take down the threat and will be disposing of them shortly. Can New Namek’s Dragon Balls revive more than one person per wish?”

“Yes, but the time limit is still one earth year,” Dende said.

You looked at Buu and nodded.

“Excuse me, but I might know two solutions,“ Buu said. When Bulma and Dende looked at her, she said, “One solution is the Super Dragon balls that could revive Gohan without any problems, but they’re planet-sized and spread throughout the seven dimensions. The second one is that we use Namek’s dragonballs and have one of Freeza’s healing pods ready to heal Gohan’s wounds and body decay as soon as he’s revived. The problem with that is getting our hands on the tech and making sure it works. That and I don't think we'll be able to revive anyone who died earlier than Gohan.”

“Pish-posh. We’ll use one of New Namek’s Dragonballs to teleport one of Freeza’s ships to Earth near me. I’ll look it over and upgrade it, so we’ll be able to heal Gohan,” Bulma said with a prideful smile, one that she hadn’t worn in years. "I should contact Chi Chi later..."

Dende smiled too, looking forward to seeing Gohan once more. “Since… Since Piccolo died, that means Kami died too. Is the role of Guardian of Earth open?”

“We’ll have to check with Mr. Popo, but I think so,” Bulma answered. "And if you do become Earth's guardian, you can restore Earth's Dragonballs and we'll use those to revive Gohan."

“Great! I’ll contact Moori and let him know everything!” Dende said.

“Alright, to contact us, just charge your hand up with some Ki and wave it around the ball with the intention of contacting us,” You answered.

choices: Go on Equestria's culture next. (More Equestria Options)
1531322.content:
First, you started with pony story, beginning with the tribes' formations and the stories behind them, there were several parallels Earth's Ancient Story and Civilizations. With Pegasus being similar to ancient Greeks or Romans, a set of pegasus towns unified into a mini kingdom by the iron hoof of Ponious Ceasar, they were the more warlike and expansionist minded of all the other tribes. They conquered and enslaved ground dwellers for food, riches and were the owners of the skies, they were on odds with Gryphons and Dragons for this aerial control

Earth Ponies has parallels with the Portuguese, Spaniards, Russians and Frenchs during the Renaissance era and unlike the warlike pegasus, they were farmers, miners and traders their goods to the Pegasus so they get the weather conditions needed for their farms and livelihood. It was also a way to prevent the pegasus or unicorns to enslave them by enabling necessary trade. They grew resentful of the two tribes because of their demanding nature.

The Unicorns had parallels with Medieval England, France, and Germany and were the most magical minded of the group as noted for their horns, it was also made them believe to be superior to the other tribes because of this trait. With their power combined, they could move the sun and the moon at will and were rightfully feared of this trait alone which only helped in feeding their egos.

The Tribes depended on each other despite the apparent hostility they have with each other. The Unicorns believed the Earth Ponies and Pegasus being Primitives and Brutes, Pegasis believed the two tribes to be spineless cowards and Earth Ponies disliked the arrogance or warlike nature of the two other species.

From there, you didn't find much difference to the show, they united after seeing that fighting over a land big enough for the three tribes weren't worth it and the cold conditions of their old land, Equinian, were following over thanks to the wendigos.

From there, all seems normal.

Until this.

There was a fourth tribe.

One that had a kingdom rooted in Equestria long before the other tribes arrived

The Alicorn Kingdom. It has no real-world parallel but found in Fantasy and Pop Culture, Elves. Living in spirally cities or none by having a perfect communion with the forests, like the Everfree, It is said that they have much more power than all the other tribes but how they lived or what happened to them is a total mystery, they simply disappeared once the tribes settled in Equestria alongside several races that used to call them home, Like Pixies, Fairies and... Humanity.

Humans were here too.

In fact, it seems that all of the books on Equestrian history and culture were produced by mare scholars.

Ay least, you think they're mares. Many of them eschewed writing their given names on the books for their cutie marks instead. You had to piece together who is writing what from context clues written in the texts themselves, a somewhat challenging and at times frustrating task to be quite honest.
Allusions to female genitalia are pretty common and mares boasting about how their pussies were so tight and responsive they could satisfy any stallion abound.
You actually crack up at a bard claiming that she could assemble a sandwich with her pelvic floor muscles alone and glibly wipe a tear from your eye.

Even more common is the assertion that stallions are more important than mares in the arena of reproduction because they provide the life-giving seed to grow the next generation of ponies and mares are merely the vessels designed to carry that seed.
You don't know if any of that's true, or how many ponies still believe this, but it kind of makes you feel a bit sorry for them like they get little to no respect for the act of knitting a new life together in the womb...

As much as you like doing research inside from the safety of your own home, you're not going to learn much about Equestrian culture by sitting around here and reading dusty books all day.

You pushed out your chair and stood up before levitating the books back onto their shelves with a wave of your hand.
In alphabetical order of course. You weren't some kind of heathen, after all.

You took a deep breath of the cool, clean air, and then exhaled, before grinning widely. It was springtime in Equestria and the gentle breeze flowing over you felt both cool and refreshing. "...Me! I'm very interested in you."
That stopped you in your tracks. You gazed down at the filly in surprise.
"You want to know about...me?" you asked uncertainly.
Diamond Tiara nodded back and cheerfully replied. "Uh-huh! I want to know all there is to know about you, what your home life was like, are you ruled by a queen, and most importantly..."
She then tilted her head to the side and gave you a queer look, ".. why do you wear those ugly robes all the time?"
This was quite a twist. You certainly hadn't expected Diamond Tiara of all ponies to be the one to approach you with questions about your culture
This could be a problem. A filly had identified you from a race of long dead human analogues and possibly mistaken you for one of their number.
All you really wished to do was quietly observe from afar and not get directly involved in pony affairs, but it seems fate had other things in store for you.
What were you supposed to say? You knew just about as much of this "Kingdom of Man" as they did, and even then your knowledge was limited to a couple sentences from a dusty old book. You didn't want to lie to the filly or make it look like you have something to hide, but you also weren't sure exactly how much you wanted to reveal about yourself.

All of the sudden, you became acutely aware of several sets of eyes watching you.
While you had been engaged in conversation with Tiara, out of the corner of your eye you spotted a small group of ponies gathering nearby,while still keeping a respectable distance away from you and Tiara. They seemed to be only only watchful and weren't agitated by your proximity to the lone filly, thank God. You didn't want the local populace thinking of you as some kind of creepy pedophile or something. Still, it would be best to be on your best behavior as to avoid an incident.
You took a deep breath and searched yourself for the best answer to give to the filly's question that won't insult her intelligence.
Diamond Tiara's wide glittering eyes gazed up at you like you were just the paragon of human knowledge and you were about to pass down some of your greatest secrets.
You gulped and made a show of tugging at the collar of your robe. "Well... you see, where I come from, we wear clothes to protect our bodies from the elements while outdoors, with the type and amount of clothing varying depending on the situation. It's considered immodest and indecent to expose yourself completely to other people in public, so humans have to wear clothes constantly. Not only that, but in most places it's also illegal to walk around in the nude and if you're caught you can get arrested and fined for indecent exposure."
Diamond Tiara narrowed her eyes, wrinkled her nose and her cute little muzzle scrunched up in confusion. "Illegal? You mean you can get thrown in jail for not wearing any clothes? That sounds like an awful place to live. I can't even imagine being forced to wear some stuffy dress every day."
You helplessly spread your hands and replied, "Trust me, it's a lot more complicated than I make it sound. There's a lot of. factors stemming from traditional and religious sources guiding our society. It's not all bad, technology has made the production of clothing pretty cheap and there's a large variety of fashions to choose from."
Tiara didn't seem too convinced by your explanation, however. In fact she seemed even more skeptical than before. Her ears drooped and her eyes were covered in a wet sheen. "Still, having to cover yourself like that is just so sad. How can anypony ever know what your special talent is if they can't see your cutie mark? It's like living in a Saddle Arabian harem..."
You were about to reply that humans didn't have any cutie marks to show when her mood suddenly brightened and she said "Oh, I'just had a great idea! Why don't you..."

1553111.content:
You decided to travel to the Mushroom Kingdom, a place that brought a lot of memories of childhood, since you played a lot of games when you were younger.

You made sure to pick one that was often as bright and happy as it appeared to be, having no desire to start off in a grimdark Mushroom Kingdom where Bowser lived up to the title of Demon King of the Koopas.

You picked one where if you were captured and cried long enough, you'd be freed. Embarrassed and made fun of for a time, but freed. Still, you knew it would have plenty of dark moments.

There were plenty of creatures that stared at you as you passed by. You suspected if you talked with them, they'd talk back.

Eventually, you neared a village. Going by what you could see, it had Mushroom people, proving you really were in the Mushroom Kingdom.

"Excuse me, but my name is Anon and I am a traveler. Could you let me know where some places you could suggest I visit and what ones to avoid?" You asked.

The mushroom person smiled before he said, "Well, There's Peach's castle about ten miles away, but you can take a bus there. If you need coins for it, just grab some from a floating block, but be careful."

"Oh?" You asked.

"There's a Super Crown powerup epidemic. Someone's managed to spread around Super Crowns where they effect anyone and they don't wear off, no matter what!" The toad answered.

"Well, I do have some spells, though I am a novice, compared to my grandma. I might be able to do something to help fix it," You replied.

"Then let Princess Peach know. She's looking for anyone who can help!" The toad said. "But don't be too surprised if you get rejected by the changed people. Some of them really enjoy looking like Peach and the fact there seems to be no cure."

"Thank you, but who are you?" You asked.

"I'm Toad-do," The Toad said.

"Well, have a nice day, Toad-do," you said before you left.

You managed to get a few coins from a few blocks and headed to the bus stop.

There's quite a few different continuities of Sonic the hedgehog.

There's the Adventure series, which is the canon video game series. This might have crossovers with other series, like with other Sega series or even Mario.

There's the Classic series, which is the Genesis series and the Sonic Mania series. This might crossover with the Adventure series.

There's Sonic X, the anime series, which you have two worlds to explore, Sonic's world and the human world.

Then there's The Archie Comic series, which was a long runner. This has plenty of crossovers with many other comic series, even with a comic version of Sonic X!

There's also if you want to help Sonic, help Eggman, or remain neutral and explore the vast world that the characters lived in.

If you help Sonic, you risk falling into the background, like so many of his friends and allies. But with your magic book, you might be able to either stand by him or become a rival and not only show him up, but perhaps do it with his [possibly former] friends and allies! After all, they might like Sonic, but could resent how he always saves the day.

If you help Eggman, you'd be helping a manchild whose a brilliant inventor who wants to conquer the world and make it an amusement park. He might get very clingy, since you might be his first willing friend.

Or perhaps, you might want to be a bad guy and show everyone what a real villain is! With your magic book by your side, Sonic doesn't stand a chance! You could even make a harem

Or you might want to do something about that person sneaking up on you. Maybe it's Amy Rose? Maybe it's Metal Sonic?

155331312.title: Turn yourself into a Mobian.

1553313122.content:
Your decision to turn into a wolf was the better choice as... well you like wolves.

Wolves are cool.

You looked at the dimensional window, it wasn't going to close, the portal will only close once the transition is done so there is no hurry, the magic circle anchoring the portal and giving a steady supply of magic will resist longer.

Very well, you started the the ritual bathing you with magic as a magical arcane symbol appeared above you, runes and other arcane circles surrounded you and began to shoot beams of magic at you, all what you felt was pure pain at the sudden bombardment of magic starting to alter you physiology and species to match the natives.

You began to shrink, growing fur, tail and even your face changed to match the face of a wolf Mobian It was really painful, feeling your flesh and bone twist and turn but you only groans rather than a shriek of agony

This was the second time you made a transformation, the first time felt worse than this.

The first time was pure agony.

Your grandmother said that the more the transformation ritual is used, the more easy, less costly and quicker it'll be.

Also less painful.

By the time the torture was over, you were panting on the floor, your robes had shrunk with you which was nice, Your physiology was pretty much unchanged except now that you have black fur with... purple? Yes, purple. Might be the side effect of the arcane in your body as it glow faintly when you began to channel your magic.

Cool.

Other than your robes, you were now pretty much naked now, wearing no pants but your private parts were nowhere to be seen but you still feel them, despite this, you don't feel the need to get clothes and cover yourself for the fur already had that function.

Casting a faint healing spell to calm your pain a bit more, you got up and looked at the window/portal it shows a jungle on the other side and it was still stable.

Content with the result, you walked up to the portal entering into new, unexplored territory.

+++

You land on the other side without much issue as the portal closes behind you. Into the large jungle. The pain was now mostly gone, leaving nothing but the phantom feeling behind. Although still sore and a bit weak, you channel your mana to accelerate your healing and overall recuperation.

You sighed, you were here now.

There is no going back unless an emergency happens or forced to retreat.

You were in the middle of the jungle

In Mobius.

Time to move.
1553313122.title: Wolf

15533131221.content:
Green, Green and More Green.

You sighed as you continue walking through but aimlessly in this massive jungle and you couldn't use your flight ability unless being spotted by any possibly outlooked, you didn't want to reveal your abilities, at least no yet for you wanted to be an observer mostly and copy abilities for new spells.

And walking in a dense jungle was NOT what you had in mind.

At least the pain was now completely gone.

Your new form gives you a much better sense of hearing and smell, an advantage of being an animal species having higher senses.

And your magic allows you to sense danger, you still hadn't sufficient energy for an invisibility spell but you didn't sense any danger nearby.

Maybe you didn't have since wildlife have evolved into bipedal beings? No, didn't Sonic Boom had both monkeys Mobians and Animals at the same time?

Well, you were lucky you hadn't run with any though.

That would be very unfortunate and messy

However, you started to hear something across the distance it sounded...
15533131221.title: Continue.

1553313124.content:
Your thought of changing into something strong and mighty, but then you thought the best way to get along with other mobians is to be something more friendly looking. You thought being a rabbit was the best way to go.

Now that you made you decision, you were about to begin using your magic tablet until you noticed the gateway that brought you here. You decided to close it so not to risk any random mobian to come across it and you didn’t need to worry as you can open the gateway again easily, provided you have plenty of mana to use at that moment. You then used the magic tablet and and a magical aura enveloped your entire body. You couldn’t see it but you can feel your transformation starting. Your body started to shrink a bit matching the same size of any average size teenage mobian. Your ears disappeared and then you felt something growing on the top of your head. It was a pair of rabbit ears that rose up and in mid length bent forward a bit thus completing the formation of the ears. Then your feet started to change by growing bursting through your shoes then you saw them looking more animal like growing fur on them and behind you a fluffy tail was forming. Once the transformation was finished the magic aura disappeared and you wondered how you look.

Using the magic tablet, you conjured something like a mirror to see your reflection. The first thing that caught your eye was that your fur color which was a light blue which could have been a side effect of the magic which you thought was weird. But then the more you thought of it you realize this might be considered normal. After all there are animals like a “blue” hedgehog and “purple” cat which you knew wouldn’t be normal fur color for those animals from your universe. You looked some more and saw that your rabbit ears looked fine, you had a white muzzle growing around your mouth, and your eyes were quite large compared to your human eyes. Your clothes changed as well since the robe you wore changed into a nice vest that covers most of your back and sides only leaving the front exposed where you can see a white oval of fur in the center of your front. You also saw white gloves now over your rabbit paws.You were expecting this since you saw the shows and comics, the lower part of you that made you a male was hidden but you can still feel that it was still there. You turned around to see you fluffy tail and gave it a way to show you can move it.

The final thing to observe was your legs and feet. Your legs were long and somehow you can feel that they were powerful. Your feet were slightly big and they managed to ruin your shoes so you thought of making new shoes, but maybe being barefoot would be beneficial instead of being cramped and weighed down by footwear of any kind. “Let’s try this lower half out”. You did a small hop letting your feet touch the ground then squatted to feel the strength build up in your legs then hopped once more and you You travel forward quickly at a kind distance before touching the ground again. You then got near a tree and started squatting to once again build strength in your legs and did a hop straight up and you got high up to almost to the top of the tree. You had powerful legs to jump high and hop long distances while your big feet would help cushion each jump you made. You heard rabbits were fast so you ran to see how fast you can run. You were faster than human form, but no way in being Sonic fast. There was one last test to try using both your legs, feet, and the tree you used to test your jumping capabilities. You made one powerful hop launching you towards the tree and once you made contact with your feet you put all the force in your feet towards the tree and bounced off it before landing on the ground again. You take a look at the tree to see there was a crater where you made impact with your feet showing your feet and legs were quite powerful. Overall, you were pretty satisfied with your transformation.

The last thing you considered was your magic tablet since even though it shrunk when it became tablet size it was still large and you didn’t want to carry it all the time as someone might notice it. You then came up with an idea and focused your magic. The tablet glowed and then disappears for moment and in the next it appeared around your neck as a necklace. Now it looks like an accessory out of sight and can be reverted back to its original form when needed to.

You were now ready to explore this different universe, but where will you start? You did see a town in the distance but you chose to not go there, at least not yet. You then decided to travel through portal as you held the necklace in one hand and focused your magic and a portal appeared. The only problem was that the portal works well when you knew the location of where you wanted to go, but since you didn’t the portal will send you anywhere randomly. You decided to let luck guide you as you closed your eyes and walked into the portal. Once you felt you went through you opened your eyes and was amazed by a beautiful sight. When looking up you see a beautiful clear blue sky that stretched out for miles not being obstructed by any trees. When you look down you see a field filled with many beautiful flowers of many colors in which you thought a rainbow was spread on the floor. A light breeze blows through and you see all the flowers move and even petals fly in the air.

Though you thought this felt peaceful and nice where you were able to view a beautiful scene, you wondered why the portal would send you here of all places. Did your necklace send you there for a reason?You decided to brush it off and enjoy the scenery a bit more.

You continue to watch the beautiful field of flowers until you saw something ahead and in the center of the field. Could that be a mobian? Being curious you decided to go there yourself and see who it is. After a minute of walking, you started hearing a gentle humming and by the sound of it seems to be female the closer you got. You were now a few feet away from the mobian and the first thing you saw was the long ears laying behind her head giving you the clue she is a rabbit. You then saw the orange clothes she was wearing and it gave you an idea who that might to be. Her outfit was different as well having an orange top with the blue ribbon paired with an orange skirt. You decided to hide the fact you knew her and answer her question. “I was walking along when I saw this beautiful field of flowers and then saw you in the middle. May I ask what you are doing here?”. She then shows you flowers tied together in a circle and she made many of them. “I’m making flower crowns for my mama and the rest of my friends to give”.

You thought that was nice and ask if you can help. She nodded yes and you went straight ahead and picked flowers and tied them together to make a crown. Cream replies, “I sure did mom. Anon even helped me make flower crowns for you and my friends”. “I’m glad but we have to go sweetie. We need to buy groceries for the house before they close”. Cream says ok and she waves goodbye to you while you do the same.

You nodded as you jogged toward them in order to catch up and then started walking with them. Then you heard Vanilla’s voice as she wanted to get to know you. “So Mr. Anon, do you live around here?”. The tablet began to glow and was creating a projection or to be more specific schematics. This will help you on help creating your home. You felt so tired that you couldn’t admire your handiwork and just went inside the house. With enough strength left you made it to the kitchen and placed all the groceries in their respective places. Then you stumbled your way through the entire house until you found the door that led to your bedroom. You went inside and the first thing that caught your weary eyes was the large bed in front of you. Once you got close enough you fell on top of the bed. Though you know you couldn’t spend time with Vanilla, you could probably spend time with Cream which you realized you were still holding in your arms. Vanilla replies, “Okay dearie. You two have fun” while she waves goodbye to the both of you. "I suppose we have no choice but to throw him in the dungeon," the lead she-dog reluctantly muttered, then shook her head. The bear took a step toward you, and you took a step backward. You weren't about to be taken without a fight, especially with the implications of the other guards wanted to do with you. You raised your hands and charged them with magical energy, fully prepared to fight for your freedom when you heard a voice ring out from somewhere nearby.

Stop!

A shower of silver sparkles sudden appeared in the air, bathing the room in a strange light that even gave the mighty looking she-bear guard pause. Eventually, the sparkles coalesced into a single mass and slowly faded in intensity, revealing the shape of a brown lynx that you could only see from the back.

Her voice was preternaturally calm as she spoke, even in light of the tense situation you were facing. The guards seemed to instantly recognize who was speaking and immediately kneeled in front of the lynx with respect, even the dragon and wolfess who had lusted after you so brazenly.

"This human is under my protection. Please return to your posts and I will take care of him."

There was a metallic clink as the lead she-dog guard bowed her head. "By your leave, my lady, we will leave the human in your capable hands. Shall I inform the queen of his arrival?"

The lynx seemed to consider it for a moment, before shaking her head. "No, I will make a report and send it to her for review, including the misconduct I witnessed here today. Shera, you need to get your recruits in order or I will be forced to do it for you."

The dragon and wolf suddenly looked very nervous and began whistling innocently, which earned them a withering glare from their commander. "Aye lady, there will be consequences for their actions, no doubt about that."

"Shera" turned to her underlings and (literally) barked out an order to her underlings, "Alright get back to your stations, all of you, nothing to see here!"

Farther than she could even imagine, you added mentally.

15533211423.content:
A phone was tossed into your lap. You picked it up and read it.

'This is Kim Possible. When we get to a rest stop, come with me and the ones ahead of you if you don't want to wind up a stud on a leash.'

You looked around. Kim and Monique were looking at you, as were Lana, Zelda, and Toadstool. Bonnie was too busy texting on her phone. You looked back at Kim and gave a slight nod before handing her the phone back.

After a few stops, Betty said, "Alright, Ladies! coming up is the pit stop. Anyone who needs to freshen up can do so. If youse not back in 15 minutes, we're leaving without yah!"

The bus stopped at a gas station, litterally named 'The Pit Stop'. Everyone on the bus left, nearly running you over when you tried leaving.

You walked around until you were behind out of sight of the bus. Within moments, Kim, Monique, Lana, Zelda, and Toadstool arrived.

"So what's the sitch with you?" Kim asked.

"I'm Anon. I got a magic book from my Grandma and she told me to go travel before she just disappeared. So I traveled and wound up here," you answered.

Zelda smiled as she said, "I guess we're entering my territory. After all, Hyrule is filled with magic objects,"

"Tch. Kim can adapt to An-nee-thang!" Monique said, glaring at Zelda.

Princess Lana took out a phone and began typing away on it.

Putting a hand on Monique's shoulder, Kim said, "It's alright. She's helped me out when magic stuff's happened on a mission."

Toadstool asked, "So Anon, I don't k now if you already know, but men either vanished from the world, became girls themselves, or are being held in secure places for their own safety. You might want to be careful."

You rubbed your chin for a few moments before asking, "I guess, but how?"

"You can marry one of us and you'd be off the market," Kim suggested.

"Actually, the law about that is being changed," Lana said with some annoyance in her voice "Men need to be with two or more women to be considered off the market, but can marry more if they choose."

"They as in the man or they as in the women?" Toadstool asked.

"It's purposely ambiguous," Lana muttered. as she put her phone away. "I contacted a friend to pick us up."

"Who?" Monique asked.

An Orange and tan microbus pulled up and the Megaman cartoon's version of Roll leaned out and cheerfully said, "Hiya! I'm Roll Light!"

As everyone entered the microbus, Lana said, "The person with us is named Anon and they're a man."

Roll slightly gasped as she began to drive. "Oh my! Anon, I might look like a human, but I'm all bot."

Kim sighed, "Anyways, Anon. Dr. Betty Director of Global Justice can protect you, that is, if you're willing to stay and help with the man shortage problem. We can also get you connected to the World Organization Of Human Protection, if you want."

Lana said, "Or you can come to Video Game Land section of Toon world. We can hire Samus Aran to help protect you if you help us with that problem."

"Samus? Isn't she a bounty hunter?" Kim asked.

"Yes, but she does the occasional protection mission from time to time," Toadstool answered. Then she had a slight blush and a giggle, which to you suggested something more.

It took you a moment to recall that Samus was in the Captain N comics. You recalled one issue that could help win Samus's friendship. One where Samus worried that she had been hypnotized to capture Princess Lana's father. Turns out that she didn't, but had stolen the reward for it when Kraid and Ridley tried to hypnotize her. If you could show that to Samus, then you knew you'd have a friend for life!

"Anon, is it?" Roll asked in a shy tone. "I was wondering. If you're not opposed to it, can we go on a date?"

The other women looked at Roll in anger before Monique asked. "We're trying to protect this man and you're asking him out on a date?"

Taking one hand off the steering wheel to curl her pony tail in a girly manner, Roll said, "Well, he is cute and I thought it was a good time for it."

The portal behind you closes. Only a few seconds later, the only thing, you can see if the tiny rock of a beacon that signals the spot in this world, which you need to go back to, if you ever want to leave, in order to get back to the spot where you left in your home world.

In front of you, you see the familiar castle, Hogwarts, towering in the clear night sky.

Someone taps you on the shoulder with their finger.

"That's not Hogwarts, just so you know it", a female voice says.

You turn around. "What?", you ask. You see, it is Hermione. Even though, she is an adult already, you recognize her.

"Yeah, I saw you appeared out of nothing and you look all confused, just lying there on the ground. So, I assumed, you thought, you were at Hogwarts", she says.

"Well...", you scratch your head a little. "Where am I then?"

"Akra Ingall. The Ministry of Foreign affairs. I work here", Hermione replies.

"Are we far from Hogwarts?", you ask very intrigued.

She chuckles a bit. "Quite far, yeah!"

"I mean, without apparition, it would take weeks to get here. How did you end up here by the way?"

You are not sure yet, whether you should tell Hermione the truth, or just make something up...

15533223113322.content:
There's many universes of the DC comic cartoons.

There's the DCAU, which is quite popular. It contains Batman: The Animated Series, Superman The Animated Series, Static Shock, Justice League, Justice League Unlimited, Batman Beyond, and The Zeta Project. It might also contain Teen Titans 2003, going by a few hints in both Teen Titans and JLU. It also has the movies Justice League vs the Fatal Five and (maybe) Batman & Harley Quinn.

There's also The Batman series, which has a Batman during his second or third year of being a hero.

There's Batman :Brave and the bold. This is a rather light-hearted series that's more of a love letter. How can you go wrong when Aquaman sings his rousing song of heroism?

And then there's Young Justice, which tends to hit its characters whim WHAM moments more so than the others and is kind of darker than the previously mentioned series.

Right behind you was Shantae.

She had her hands on her hips and a frown on her face.

Obviously, she was suspicious.

"Who are you?" She asked.

"I am [Y/N] and I am a traveller," You answered. "And you are?"

"I am Shantae, half-genie guardian of Scuttle Town. What are you doing here?" Shantae asked, letting one hand drop from her hips.

"Merely travelling. My grandma gave me a magic book and told me to travel worlds," You answered. "If there is a problem, I'd be happy to help, especially with someone as cute and attractive as you."

Shantae blushed before looking away. "Uh, thanks."

"Then again, you probably get a lot of complements from just about everyone you meet," You said. You knew she had confidence problems, so you wanted to help with that.

She idly began to play with her ponytail, muttering, "Actually, you're kind of the first, outside of Rottytops. She's one of my friends and she is a zombie."

"Well, I'm glad to have brightened up your day a little. So what brought you out here?" you asked. She kept giving you quick glances, like a shy schoolgirl. She looked adorable and even a bit sexy.

"I heard rumors that a tinkerbat was seen around here. Since I haven't seen their Pirate leader, Risky Boots, for awhile, I decided to be proactive for once and stop her before she can complete one of her schemes," Shantae answered as she looked at you with a smile.

"I'd be happy to help," You said with a bow.

"Thanks, but don't be surprised if you can't keep up," Shantae replied before doing a belly dance. She changed into a monkey. "Because I can change into any animal with a dance!"

She ran off out of your sight.

You took out your book and looked for a find-person spell.

15533223221.content:
Just to briefly explain things: Road Rovers was a show from the 1990s that followed five dogs anthropomorphized by something called a ‘transdogmifier’. Referred to ‘Cano-sapiens’, they were used by Professor Shephard, aka ‘The Master’, to combat the evil General Parvo. The five dogs, who in the canon storyline were all placed with world leaders, were:
1 Hunter, an American Golden Retriever with super speed who led the team
2 Colleen, a British Border Collie and the only female in the team
3 Blitz, a German Doberman with the ability to bite into most things
4 Exile (Exilo Michalovitch Sanhusky), a Russian Husky with super vision (think producing heat or cold from the eyes, for example) and super strength, and
5 Shag, a Swiss OES (Old English Sheepdog) who looks the least humanoid of the team, but is still biped, in cano-sapiens form.

There were actually eight dogs in the recurring cast, the other three being Muzzle (formerly Scout), a Rottweiler; Persia, an Afghan Hound ‘Space Rover’ (think astronaut); and Professor Hubert, a Bloodhound scientist. Also, Hunter had a mother, as did Exile (along with his father).

Explaining over, do you enter the regular Road Rovers universe, or do you enter a different version of the universe?
15533223221.title: Road Rovers

155332232212.content:
Ok then, what about this one?

The idea here is that, instead of being nominally just the main five (plus Muzzle), the Road Rovers are a global movement of thousands of Cano-Sapiens answering to the name and ideals of The Master. Hunter would lead the American Road Rovers (and the global movement at large) from the White House (where he lives with the human US President), Colleen would lead the British Road Rovers from 10 Downing Street (where she lives with the human PM of Britain), Blitz would lead the German Road Rovers from Bellevue Palace, Berlin (where he lives with the human Chancellor) and Exile would lead the Russian Road Rovers from the Kremlin (where he lives with the human President of Russia), while Shag would have an important position in the Swiss Road Rovers (leader, if you want) based in Bern. The five would still team up on occasion, alone, with members of their national units alongside them, or with other national Road Rover leaders. The transdogmifier still exists in this scenario (the Road Rovers would not be without it), and the Rovers can use it to switch between Cano-sapien and regular form depending on whether they’re on active duty, on alert, or off-duty. Each Road Rover lives with a family, and the national leads can call for their subordinates to report for duty if necessary, but only The Master can call for a national leader if they are off-duty.

In addition, space is considered by the Rovers as a ‘nation’, with Persia as the national leader for space, while Hubert provides scientific assistance to the current leader of the global movement.

Is this idea good enough for you?
155332232212.title: Different

info.brief_description: You're a dimensional traveler, able to open portals to other universes and dimensions.
info.description:
On the outside, you're a normal person but you hold the secret of multiversal travel through a magic book you uncovered from your family's old stash, magic exists, who knew? However, you were taught by your grandmother who was a witch or rather a plane-sorcerer in her youth and revealed the secret of dimensional travel to you, able to fly and even change your size and mass.

There aren't limits now for you can go through the planes on your leisure.

Rules:

You can do whatever you want, there aren't limits but do not end the storyline.

Also, no Scat, Diaper, or Toilet content.

Everything else is fair game.
